R

Random - Class in model.utilities
To generate all the random aspects of the game : dice, cards, countries assignment...
Random() - Constructor for class model.utilities.Random
 
read(String) - Static method in class model.utilities.FileHandler
The method is to read the selected file and check whether the file can be open or read.
ReinforcementView - Class in view.gameplay
The class is for the view to show the changes and the steps of the Reinforcement phase in the game.
